name: The Note (itch)
description:
This is the demo for a visual novel I just started making.

Sylvia has just discovered a mysterious note inside her locker asking her to meet up at a nearby park. She has no idea who has sent her this request, and whether the meetup is an authentic request or a dangerous trap.

Checkout the making of this game at:

 https://youtu.be/3BgCskJ-DlE

Follow me at:

https://twitter.com/buffaloHD
